metadata.title: CVE-2017-11328 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Heap buffer overflow in the yr_object_array_set_item() function in object.c in YARA 3.x allows a denial-of-service attack by scanning a crafted .NET file.

criterions.comment: yara package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-1ubuntu2').
